name: SpaceZot
description:
SpaceZot is the adaptation of the last arcade game you can find at the Black Hole, the Chiss's bar on Terminus.

If you do not know what I'm talking about, you've never played Cosmos the Secret Melody, the Spatial RPG made by DrFloyd.

http://www.gamopat.com/2018/12/cosmos-the-secret-melody-v.10.html

This adaptation has been done with Love2D, it is exactly the same version as the Arcade Cabinet.

I will post soon the Commostrad version with enhanced graphism and gameplay.
